attributes.action: Mobilise Y13 students as a part time community relief service.
attributes.background: Following the school closures, rather than giving out predicted grades at A-Level and other KS5 exams, mobilise Y13 students from across the country to act as a part time community relief service so as to keep them occupied until their public exams can be rescheduled at a later date.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. People, including Y13 students, can already volunteer.  We can't accept petitions that call for people to be forced to undertake voluntary work. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
